Docs.summary: This widget is a layout that contains several specifically-named child views that handle keyboard entry interpreted as standard phone dialpad digits.

remarks.para: This widget is a layout that contains several specifically-named child views that handle keyboard entry interpreted as standard phone dialpad digits.
This member is deprecated. Use a custom view or layout to handle this functionality instead
